parameters.command:
=# 1. Define paths (Use absolute path for the runner script)
RUNNER_SCRIPT="/home/backsippan/gh/etc/ds9/agent_runner.py"
WORKTREE="{{ $('Initialize Variables').item.json.worktree_path }}"
RESUME_URL="{{ $execution.resumeUrl }}"
# 2. Define Prompt (MUST be quoted to handle spaces)
PROMPT="{{ $('Initialize Variables').item.json.body.prompt }}"
# 3. Execution
# We run the script from the main repo, but tell it to work (--cwd) in the worktree
nohup python3 "$RUNNER_SCRIPT" \
  --webhook "$RESUME_URL" \
  --cwd "$WORKTREE" \
  --cmd "opencode run --agent builder \"$PROMPT\"" \
  > /dev/null 2>&1 &

= REPORT_FILE="/home/backsippan/gh/etc/ds9/failures/{{ $('Initialize Variables').first().json.task_id }}_report.json"
    mkdir -p /home/backsippan/gh/etc/ds9/failures
    # Write the full inspector decision to the file
    echo '{{ JSON.stringify($json) }}' > "$REPORT_FILE"
    # Also cleanup the worktree so we don't leave mess behind?
    # Optional: git worktree remove ...

=cd {{ $('Initialize Variables').first().json.worktree_path }} && \
    git push -u origin feature/{{ $('Initialize Variables').first().json.task_id }} && \
    gh pr create \
      --title "feat: {{ $('Initialize Variables').first().json.task_id }} implementation" \
      --body "{{ $json.summary || 'Automated PR by Foreman' }}" \
      --draft

=WORKTREE="{{ $('Initialize Variables').item.json.worktree_path }}" && \
cd "$WORKTREE" && \
git diff main...HEAD > inspector_diff.patch

=# 1. Define paths (Use absolute path for the runner script)
RUNNER_SCRIPT="/home/backsippan/gh/etc/ds9/agent_runner.py"
WORKTREE="{{ $('Initialize Variables').item.json.worktree_path }}"
# 2. Define Prompt (MUST be quoted to handle spaces)
PROMPT="Review the file inspector_diff.patch in this workspace. You are the 'Inspector' agent for this repo and MUST follow prompts/inspector.prompt.md and AGENTS.md. Output EXACTLY one JSON object and nothing else, with this shape: { \"status\": \"approved\" | \"changes_requested\", \"issues\": [ { \"severity\": \"blocker\" | \"major\" | \"minor\", \"description\": \"...\", \"paths\": [\"...\"] } ], \"next_tasks\": [\"...\"] }. Do not use any other keys such as 'decision' or 'notes'. After outputting the JSON, terminate."
# 3. Execution
# We run the script from the main repo, but tell it to work (--cwd) in the worktree
nohup python3 "$RUNNER_SCRIPT" \
  --webhook "$RESUME_URL" \
  --cwd "$WORKTREE" \
  --cmd "opencode run --agent inspector \"$PROMPT\"" \
  > /dev/null 2>&1 &
